name: Wind-UP Racer
description:
This project was created for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 with the Theme of 'Rewind'.

Wind-up Racer is a simple driving game with a twist. You will have to constantly rewind the key of your car in order to drive it. The goal of the game is to get to the Shoe box in each room before the time runs out. Hope you all enjoy!
